title: Road21Bitcoin
author: Road21Bitcoin
created_time: February 22, 2023, 12:52:28 PMLast edit: February 22, 2023, 05:01:17 PM by Road21Bitcoin
content: .Image Source: fb/Wykrhm Reddy  • I created this thread for this event will wrap up once the game is over. • Which teams do you believe will be at the top of the bracket, just a few hours before the event begins?Note:  • Group Stage - February 22 - February 26, 2023 • Playoffs - February 28 - March 5, 2023

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Good to see Dota2 tournament again, and as expected Team Liquid is still the favorite team to win the championship. Well, few more hours and they will commence The Lima Major 2023. Interesting to see other teams to qualify for this.I think this will be a battle between European team and China.  Will start looking for a better odds for this one and will surely not miss to watch the game as well.

comments.author: Road21Bitcoin
comments.body: The Lima Major Group Stage — Day 2 Standings.Image Source: fb/KuyanicFrom Group A: Western Europe team at the top of Group A while two Chinese teams at bottom, unexpected from PSG.LGD.From Group B: Expected from Group B that Team Liquid will take the lead while Knights at the very bottom with no wins. Perhaps the issue of Knights in the last DPC CN 2023 Tour 1: Division I is true.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Nice update OP, It’s been a long time since I didn’t watch Dota2 tournament after the last TI. Also I’m surprised how Kuyanic page evolve on producing a quality materials for presentation of the leaderboard. Team Liquid is expected to dominate this tournament since they won the WEU qualifiers without any loss while most of the power house team is already there. What really surprised me is the good performance of Talon E-sports. I wonder if they can keep this up on the next few days of group stage.

comments.author: Road21Bitcoin
comments.body: The Lima Major Playoffs Bracket.Image Source: fb/Wykrhm ReddyUpcoming Matches - February 28, 2023 • GG Gaimin Gladiators vs Team Aster Aster • Entity Entity vs Evil Geniuses EG • TSpirit Team Spirit vs Shopify Rebellion SR • Liquid Team Liquid vs Talon Esports Talon

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Road21Bitcoin on February 22, 2023, 12:52:28 PM<snip>I am rooting for SEA teams, especially Geek Slate. I expected that Liquid will be dominating in this tournament. On the other hand, I didn’t see Thundra to be behind the current standing… I think one why they are behind is that Wraith Pack was nerfed (which Thundra heavily countered from the last TI)? Anyways, I want to see some revelations of OP items and/or heroes.

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: After losing 2 parlays I am back to the usual single bets. I am cheering for Shopify Rebellion but I am not too confident betting against Team Spirit. Meanwhile, I am betting on Gaimin Gladiators, Entity, and Team Liquid. These teams will have better chances of proceeding into the upper bracket semifinals.Today will be full of great games as each team will give it all since dropping into the lower bracket is not a guarantee of a comeback. Definitely not an easy road when PSG.LGD, beastcoast, and Tundra are the ones waiting in the lower bracket.

comments.author: Yourhis
comments.body: Making money in Dota will bring many difficulties. You will have to accept the lifestyle of players who dedicate at least 8 hours a day to this game. You will take big risks, and no one guarantees you the result.
